snippet: The Socialist leader, Pedro Sánchez, attacked Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy over allegations of high-level corruption and accused him of lying over his government’s economic record.
lead_paragraph: The Socialist leader, Pedro Sánchez, attacked Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy over allegations of high-level corruption and accused him of lying over his government’s economic record.

headline.main: Debate Accusation Inserts Drama Into Spanish Election
headline.print_headline: Debate Accusation Inserts Drama Into Spanish Election
